title: How to Refill a 5 Gallon Water Dispenser

steps.headline: Remove the foam seal from the cap if there is one.
steps.description: Note that Ciel bottle caps have a left-hand thread, so turn right (clockwise) to loosen.

steps.headline: Cut a hole in the cap about half the diameter.
steps.description: You can use a drill or a knife.

steps.headline: Replace the foam, and screw on the modified lid.
Invert the bottle onto the dispenser.
steps.description: The water pressure against the foam cap will keep all but maybe a slight dribble from leaking.

steps.headline: The center protrusion will force the seal out, releasing the water.
steps.description: The foam seal will then float to the top.

text: Remove the foam seal from the cap if there is one. Note that Ciel bottle caps have a left-hand thread, so turn right (clockwise) to loosen. Cut a hole in the cap about half the diameter. You can use a drill or a knife. Replace the foam, and screw on the modified lid.  Invert the bottle onto the dispenser. The water pressure against the foam cap will keep all but maybe a slight dribble from leaking. The center protrusion will force the seal out, releasing the water. The foam seal will then float to the top.
